[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits with a value of -4,574,000 is represented as a child of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities with a value of -14,597,000 in the companies extension taxonomy role 00000007 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF CASH FLOWS. The element us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities in the US-GAAP taxonomies. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities and the child element us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits.
The properties of this us-gaap:PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherDeposits fact are:
Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/778164/000161577419004168/peix-20181231.xml 5863

[DQC.US.0081.9278] The line item concept us-gaap:AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium with a value of 720,000 and a calculation parent of us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities is represented as a sibling of us-gaap:AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts in the extension taxonomy role 00000007 - Statement - CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF CASH FLOWS, but us-gaap:AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium is represented as a descendent of us-gaap:AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts in the us-gaap taxonomies. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for these two line item concepts.
The properties of this us-gaap:AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium fact are:
Period :2018-01-01 to 2018-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/778164/000161577419004168/peix-20181231.xml 5751
